item.title: Announcing General Availability: Microsoft Sentinel Solution for Microsoft Business Applications
item.description: As organizations increasingly rely on low-code platforms for mission-critical operations, the need for threat protection across all business applications has never been greater. Today, we announce the general availability of the Microsoft Sentinel Solution for Microsoft Business Applications - a unified solution providing threat detection and monitoring for Microsoft Power Platform (including Copilot Studio agents, apps, and flows) and Dynamics 365 (Customer Engagement and Finance & Operations) workloads.
